greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: a(n)=c(p(n))/p(n), where c = Perrin sequence A001608 (starting 0,2,3,...) and p(n) = n-th prime.
reference: An Insufficient Condition for Primality, Problem 10268, American Mathematical Monthly, v. 103, n. 10, p. 911, Dec. 1996.
link: Seiichi Manyama, Table of n, a(n) for n = 1..1000 (terms 1..200 from T. D. Noe)
xref: See A001608, the main entry for the Perrin sequence.
results.author: _Clark Kimberling_, _Robert G. Wilson v_
